wikipedia_page.main: George Tyson is a rugby league footballer who plays as a centre, second-row or loose forward for Swinton in the Betfred Championship.He has previously played for Salford, Sheffield Eagles and Oldham (Heritage № 1333). He plays at loose forward or centre.

response: * George Tyson (1900s rugby league) (died 1937), English rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s
* George Tyson (rugby league, born 1993), rugby league footballer for Sheffield Eagles
